name: NugetSemverVersion
description: Sets version attributes in AssemblyInfo.cs in a manner which is compatible with Nuget and Semantic Versioning 2.0.0.
author: Johan Classon

inputs.name: pattern
inputs.label: Build number pattern
inputs.helpMarkDown: The pattern to extracte the four version numbers from the build number. This must match exactly four entries separated by periods.

inputs.name: makeReleaseVersion
inputs.label: Make release version
inputs.helpMarkDown: If not checked, the AssemblyInformationalVersion-attribute will be like 1.2.3. If checked, it will include a prerelease token like 1.2.3-abc.

inputs.name: PreReleaseName
inputs.label: Prerelease name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the prerelease. Will be included in the AssemblyInformationalVersion-attribute like 1.2.3-abc.

inputs.name: IncludeRevInPreRelease
inputs.label: Include build revision number
inputs.helpMarkDown: If checked, the prerelease name will include the build revision number so that the AssemblyInformationalVersion-attribute will be like 1.2.3-abc0123.

instanceNameFormat: Nuget Compatible SemVer Versioning of build $(Build.BuildNumber)
